means: “大富翁”(棋类游戏，游戏者以玩具钞票买卖房地产)

example.ex: ...Russian moves to end a state monopoly on land ownership.
example.tran: 俄国人采取的终止国家垄断土地所有权的措施

example.ex: ...the governing party's monopoly over the media.

gramarinfo.label: oft with poss, oft N <l>on/over</l> n/-ing

value.def: If a company, person, or state has a monopoly on something such as an industry, they have complete control over it, so that it is impossible for others to become involved in it.
A monopoly is a company which is the only one providing a particular product or service.

example.ex: Women do not have a monopoly on feelings of betrayal.
example.tran: 被出卖的感觉并非只有女性才有。

value.def: If you say that someone does not have a monopoly on something, you mean that they are not the only person who has that thing.
